pageContent: Purpose: To study the association between time from diagnosis to radical prostatectomy (RP-interval) and prostate cancer-specific mortality (PCSM), histological findings in the RP-specimen and failure after RP (RP-failure).

metaData.source:
Concepts of epigenetics in prostate cancer development
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19002169/
